bug.author: wanghaoshuang
bug.description:
Demo's args order in document and the info atgument is wrong. get from third argument at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/blob/develop/paddle/gserver/evaluators/Evaluator.cpp#L874>here</denchmark-link> . And arguments of evaluator come from evaluator config as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/blob/develop/paddle/gserver/evaluators/Evaluator.cpp#L27>here</denchmark-link>
So, info should be appended into input after label and before weight.
